definition: different tunes played with equal skill (idiom)/different methods leading to the same result/different approach but equally satisfactory outcome

sentences.english: A contract laborer works in Vishakapatnam, India.
sentences.chinese: 在印度維沙卡帕特南工作的一名合同工。

sentences.english: Walk with me and work with me-watch how I do it.
sentences.chinese: 跟我走，與我同工，看我是怎麼做的。

sentences.english: Pray for each fellowship and group, pray for their2007 new ministry and their needs.
sentences.chinese: 爲各團契小組即將展開的新事工及所需要的同工代禱。

sentences.english: Eg Even in most western countries, women do not always get equal pay for equal wok.
sentences.chinese: 即使在多數西方國家，婦女也不總是同工同酬的。

sentences.english: Next I'll describe how the components of the search application work together.
sentences.chinese: 接下來我將介紹搜索應用程序的組件如何協同工作。

sentences.english: For his 2 nd missionary journey, there was Silas, and later Timothy.
sentences.chinese: 第二次宣教旅行時，有西拉和提摩太同工。

sentences.english: I'll pray for you. May God make us co-work with co-win in Jesus the Lord!
sentences.chinese: 我會爲你禱告，求主耶穌使我們同工同勝。

sentences.english: Pray the election for new deacons on next Sunday (12/6).
Lipoxygenase 3(LOX3)is the major component among the LOX isozymes in mature rice seeds.
sentences.chinese: LOX3是主要的水稻種胚脂氧合酶同工酶。

sentences.english: Isozymegenes in Megalobrama skolkovii apparently exhibit a tissue specific expression.
sentences.chinese: 魴同工酶的表達具有明顯的組織特異性。

sentences.english: For example, we are working with Magna Steyr in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 例如，我們與歐洲的麥格納斯太爾公司協同工作。

sentences.english: They work together by communicating through events.
sentences.chinese: 它們通過事件進行通信，協同工作。

sentences.english: He calls for private security contractors to be licensed.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲民營的安全合同工應當有執照。

sentences.english: POD isozyme differences, can be used as biochemical indicators of species identification.
sentences.chinese: POD同工酶差異明顯，可作爲品種鑑定的生化指標。

sentences.english: Lactate dehydrogenase (LDH) isozymes of 20 species of Cyprinidae fish were analysed with disc polyacrylamide gel electrophoresis.
sentences.chinese: 本文對20種鯉科魚類的同工酶表型進行了分析比較。

sentences.english: Women demand equal pay for equal work.

definition: different tunes played with equal skill (idiom)/different methods leading to the same result/different approach but equally satisfactory outcome
traceable to the same stock (idiom); of a common origin (of trends, ideas etc)
to be precisely the same/to be no different
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
to draw on (others' experience)/to learn from (how others do things)/lesson to be learned (by observing others)
to bring out the best in each other (idiom)/to complement one another well
to run in the opposite direction (idiom); to run counter to
to merge together (idiom); to unify disparate elements into one whole
not at all the same/substantially different
